channel.title: PI how to make a weapon use a gfx
channel.description: Im trying to add a gfx to a weapon when it hits so for example when i hit a monster with a blue whip (item 15442) How do i make it do like a blue mage splash? ty.

item.title: PI how to make a weapon use a gfx
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

I Just need to know what code it is and where to put it.
Im thinking somewhere in combatassistant.java
But im not sure.

The Splash that happens when you hit with magic is what i mean. so in this case i meant gfx 502 not 509. Thanks.
Thats what i want it to do.

Read full topic
item.source: PI how to make a weapon use a gfx

item.title: PI how to make a weapon use a gfx
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

What do you necessarily mean by “mage splash”?

Do you mean the graphic that appears when you fail to hit with magic?

If you do not know the graphic ID number simply do:

[code=java]if (command.startsWith(“gfx”)) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");
int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int b = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
try {
for (int i = a; i < b; i++) {
//your graphics method here ie.
sendGfx(i);
sendMessage("Sending graphics ID: " + i);
Thread.currentThread().sleep(1000); //adjust time
}
} catch (Exception e) {
//caught
}
}

[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: PI how to make a weapon use a gfx
